career.name: AviSoft
career.title: Full Stack Developer Intern
description: Tech Stack: NextJs, AngularJS, DaisyUI, MERN Stack, TypeScript
Migration Project: Successfully migrated a client website from AngularJS to Next.js, significantly improving performance and SEO rankings.
UI Design: Leveraged the DaisyUI library for efficient, responsive, and modern UI component design, enhancing the user experience.
Performance Optimization: Implemented server-side rendering with Next.js to optimize loading speeds and boost overall application performance.
